titleStmt.title: Greetings of pure peace and perfect love, sent unto all the poor, scattered, little, holy flock of Jesus Christ, the Lamb of God. Behold the Lamb of God that taketh away the sins of the world.
titleStmt.author: D. W. (Dorothy White)

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Errors in paging: p. 17, 20, and 21 numbered 16, 9, and 13 repectively.
Imperfect: stained, and torn, with loss of text on last two pages.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
